verses.verse: Ask <WH7592> rain <WH4306> from the Lord <WH3068> at the time <WH6256> of the spring <WH4456> rain <WH4456> â€“ The Lord <WH3068> who makes <WH6213> the storm <WH2385> clouds; <WH2385> And He will give <WH5414> them showers <WH1653> of rain, <WH1653> vegetation <WH6212> in the field <WH7704> to [each] man. <WH376>

For the teraphim <WH8655> speak <WH1696> iniquity, <WH205> And the diviners <WH7080> see <WH2372> lying <WH8267> visions, <WH8267> And tell <WH1696> false <WH7723> dreams; <WH2472> They comfort <WH5162> in vain. <WH7723> Therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> [the people] wander <WH5265> like <WH3644> sheep, <WH6629> They are afflicted, <WH6031> because <WH3588> there <WH369> is no <WH369> shepherd. <WH7462>

"My anger <WH639> is kindled <WH2734> against <WH5921> the shepherds, <WH7462> And I will punish <WH6485> the male <WH6260> goats; <WH6260> For the Lord <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> has visited <WH6485> His flock, <WH5739> the house <WH1004> of Judah, <WH3063> And will make <WH7760> them like His majestic <WH1935> horse <WH5483> in battle. <WH4421>

"From them will come <WH3318> the cornerstone, <WH6438> From them the tent <WH3489> peg, <WH3489> From them the bow <WH7198> of battle, <WH4421> From them every <WH3605> ruler, <WH5065> [all] of them together. <WH9191>

"And they will be as mighty <WH1368> men, <WH1368> Treading <WH947> down <WH947> [the enemy] in the mire <WH2916> of the streets <WH2351> in battle; <WH4421> And they will fight, <WH3898> for the Lord <WH3068> [will be] with them; And the riders <WH7392> on horses <WH5483> will be put <WH954> to shame. <WH954>

"And I shall strengthen <WH1396> the house <WH1004> of Judah, <WH3063> And I shall save <WH3467> the house <WH1004> of Joseph, <WH3130> And I shall bring <WH7725> them back, <WH7725> Because <WH3588> I have <WH7355> had <WH7355> compassion <WH7355> on them; And they will be as though <WH9201> I had not rejected <WH2186> them, For I am the Lord <WH3068> their God, <WH430> and I will answer <WH6030> them.

"And Ephraim <WH669> will be like a mighty <WH1368> man, <WH1368> And their heart <WH3820> will be glad <WH8055> as if <WH3644> [from] wine; <WH3196> Indeed, their children <WH1121> will see <WH7200> [it] and be glad, <WH8055> Their heart <WH3820> will rejoice <WH1523> in the Lord. <WH3068>
"I will whistle <WH8319> for them to gather <WH6908> them together, For I have redeemed <WH6299> them; And they will be as numerous <WH7235> as they were before.

"When I scatter <WH2232> them among the peoples, <WH5971> They will remember <WH2142> Me in far <WH4801> countries, <WH4801> And they with their children <WH1121> will live <WH2421> and come <WH7725> back. <WH7725>

"I will bring <WH7725> them back <WH7725> from the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> And gather <WH6908> them from Assyria; <WH804> And I will bring <WH935> them into the land <WH776> of Gilead <WH1568> and Lebanon, <WH3844> Until no <WH3808> [room] can be found <WH4672> for them.

"And He will pass <WH5674> through the sea <WH3220> [of] distress, <WH6869> And strike <WH5221> the waves <WH1530> in the sea, <WH3220> So that all <WH3605> the depths <WH4688> of the Nile <WH2975> will dry <WH3001> up; And the pride <WH1347> of Assyria <WH804> will be brought <WH3381> down, <WH3381> And the scepter <WH7626> of Egypt <WH4714> will depart. <WH5493>
"And I shall strengthen <WH1396> them in the Lord, <WH3068> And in His name <WH8034> they will walk, <WH1980>" declares <WH5002> the Lord. <WH3068>
